scripts.set-env: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const packageJson = require('./package.json'); const packageName = packageJson.name || 'defaultProjectName'; const envContent = 'NEXT_PUBLIC_PROJECT_NAME=' + packageName + '\n'; console.log('Package Name:', packageName); fs.writeFileSync('.env', envContent, { encoding: 'utf8' }); console.log('Environment file created with project name:', packageName);"
